TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 允许由部分信任的代码调用程序集。

span.span: Allows an assembly to be called by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 如果没有此声明，则只有完全信任的调用方才可以使用此程序集。

span.span: Without this declaration, only fully trusted callers are able to use the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]引入了新的安全规则影响的行为属性 (请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md))。The [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] introduces new security rules that affect the behavior of the attribute (see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)). 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，所有代码默认值为安全透明的也就是说，部分受都信任的。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], all code defaults to security-transparent, that is, partially trusted. 但是，可批注由于各个类型和成员，以将它们分配其他将透明特性。However, you can annotate individual types and members to assign them other transparency attributes. 有关此更改以及其他安全更改，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For this and other security changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md). .NET framework 2.0 版 （） 程序集，必须对强命名要有效地使用(APTCA) 特性。.NET Framework version 2.0 () assemblies must be strong-named to effectively use the (APTCA) attribute. [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] （） 程序集并不一定要具有强名称以使 APTCA 特性才能奏效，它们可以包含透明、 安全关键和安全可靠关键代码。 () assemblies do not have to be strong-named for the APTCA attribute to be effective, and they can contain transparent, security-critical and security-safe-critical code. 有关应用程序集级别的特性的详细信息，请参阅[应用特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md)。For more information about applying attributes at the assembly level, see [Applying Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md). 默认情况下，如果一个强名称的程序集不显式应用程序集级别的此特性，则可以通过授予完全信任其他程序集调用。By default, if a strong-named, assembly does not explicitly apply this attribute at the assembly level, it can be called only by other assemblies that are granted full trust. 通过将强制执行此限制为`FullTrust`上每个公共或受保护的方法，在程序集中的每个可公开访问的类。This restriction is enforced by placing a for `FullTrust` on every public or protected method on every publicly accessible class in the assembly. 旨在由部分受信任代码调用的程序集可以声明使用及其意图。Assemblies that are intended to be called by partially trusted code can declare their intent through the use of . 在 C# 中声明的一个示例是`[assembly:AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers]`; 在 Visual Basic 中的一个示例是``。An example of the declaration in C# is `[assembly:AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers]`; an example in Visual Basic is ``. > [!CAUTION] > 此程序集级别属性是否存在阻止放置的默认行为`FullTrust`安全检查，并使该程序集可调用从任何其他 （部分或完全受信任） 的程序集。The presence of this assembly-level attribute prevents the default behavior of placing `FullTrust` security checks, and makes the assembly callable from any other (partially or fully trusted) assembly. 当存在 APTCA 特性时，所有其他安全检查函数按预期，包括任何存在的类级别或方法级别的声明性安全属性。When the APTCA attribute is present, all other security checks function as intended, including any class-level or method-level declarative security attributes that are present. 此属性会阻止仅隐式的、 完全受信任的调用方的请求。This attribute blocks only the implicit, fully trusted caller demand. 这不是声明性安全特性，而常规属性 (它派生自，不是从)。This is not a declarative security attribute, but a regular attribute (it derives from , not from ). 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/CPP/AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/CS/AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/VB/allowpartiallytrustedcallersattribute.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应仅在程序集级别应用此属性。This attribute should be applied only at the assembly level. ## Examples 有关如何使用此构造函数的示例，请参阅为提供的代码示例类。For an example of how to use this constructor, see the code example provided for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel PartialTrustVisibilityLevel { System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel get(); void set(System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用 (APTCA) 特性标记的代码的默认部分信任可见性。

span.span: Gets or sets the default partial trust visibility for code that is marked with the (APTCA) attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following examples demonstrate how to use this property. - 默认情况下，无条件 APTCA:Default, unconditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers] ``` 默认为 。Defaults to . - 显式的、 无条件 APTCA:Explicit, unconditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers(PartialTrustVisibilityLevel=VisibleToAllHosts)] ``` 程序集始终可以由部分信任的代码调用。The assembly can always be called by partial-trust code. - 显式的、 条件 APTCA:Explicit, conditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers(PartialTrustVisibilityLevel=NotVisibleByDefault)] ``` 程序集具有已审核的部分信任，但不是对默认情况下的部分信任代码可见。The assembly has been audited for partial trust, but it is not visible to partial-trust code by default. 若要使程序集对部分信任的代码可见，请将该程序集添加到 属性。To make the assembly visible to partial-trust code, add it to the property.
